org.kitteh.irc.client.library.defaults.feature

Class DefaultServerInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kitteh.irc.client.library.defaults.feature.DefaultServerInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerInfo, ServerInfo.WithManagement

    public class DefaultServerInfo
extends Object
implements ServerInfo.WithManagement
    Default implementation for tracking server information.

      • getChannelModes

        public @NonNull List<ChannelMode> getChannelModes()
        Description copied from interface: ServerInfo
        Gets the channel modes available. If the server has not provided information on channel modes, defaults are used and returned here.
        Specified by:
        getChannelModes in interface ServerInfo
        Returns:
        available channel modes

      • getChannelPrefixes

        public @NonNull List<Character> getChannelPrefixes()
        Description copied from interface: ServerInfo
        Gets the list of accepted channel prefixes. If the server has not provided this information all four listed in the IRC spec are returned (#&!+).
        Specified by:
        getChannelPrefixes in interface ServerInfo
        Returns:
        available channel prefixes

      • getChannelUserModes

        public @NonNull List<ChannelUserMode> getChannelUserModes()
        Description copied from interface: ServerInfo
        Gets the list of accepted channel user modes, such as op. Modes are listed from most powerful to least powerful. If the server has not provided this information a default list of op (mode o for prefix @) and voice (mode v for prefix +) are returned.
        Specified by:
        getChannelUserModes in interface ServerInfo
        Returns:
        channel modes defining user status

        Specified by:
